thread.title: Giant slide attracts hundreds of half termers to Framlingham Castle in Suffolk
thread.title_full: Giant slide attracts hundreds of half termers to Framlingham Castle in Suffolk | Anglia - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Giant slide attracts hundreds of half termers to Framlingham Castle in Suffolk
text:
See ITV Anglia's report here
Play video Framlingham Castle in Suffolk is having major conservation work carried out on it. And when builders put up some serious scaffolding English Heritage decided to capitalise on it and attach a 6 metre long slide to the top of it.
Hundreds of children and adults have already tried the slide. Credit: ITV Anglia The slide will stay up until May 2017 when work on the wall walk and ramparts is scheduled to finish.
Last updated Mon 13 Feb 2017 Suffolk Framlingham
